Package com.example.inventorymanager.ui.filter

Class chooseFilterFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.inventorymanager.ui.filter.chooseFilterFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class chooseFilterFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
Manages the screen that enables users to choose filtering conditions. Users may choose filters based on the date the item was purchased, the make of the item, or keywords from the item's description.
Author:
Isaac Joffe, David Onchuru, Sumaiya Salsabil
See Also:
  • filteredItemsFragment
